pages.text: $(li)The Warped Garden is a unnatural aquatic structure that can be found in the $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/water/ocean)Oceans$(/l) of the Overworld.$(br)$(li)It can be found a renewable source of coral blocks in their interior.$(br)$(li)Do not let those $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/drowned)Drowned$(/l) inside these structures take you by surprise.
